name: Delaaja
aura: Increase Ally HP in Faction Crypts by 30

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit heals this Champion by 2% of their MAX HP. 

Each hit also has a 20% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
